CashStoreItem - Class in sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.store
This entity object represents a column of coins in the vending machine. It can store a coin of any particular type. There can be as many CashStoreItem as desire in the vending machine. There can be more than one CashStoreItem storing the same or different types of Coin This number will be configurable. This will be implemented as an instance of StoreItem.

changeStoreQty(int, int, int) - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.store.StoreController
This method will either:
- instruct the CashStore to update the quantity of a Coin denomination to new value supplied and update the total cash held in the CashStore; or
- instruct the DrinksStore to update the drinks stock for a DrinksBrand required to a new value supplied.

CustomerPanel - Class in sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer
This class Customer Panel display the GUI interactive with the Customer. This panel simulates the vending machine's customer interface panel. It will enable the user (Customer) to: insert coins; select Brands; terminate Transaction. It will also provide the following display functions; display total money inserted.
CustomerPanel(Frame, TransactionController) - Constructor for class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.CustomerPanel
This constructor creates an instance of the Customer Panel. It further creates Invalid Coin Display, No Change Available Display, Refund/ Change Tray Display, Total Money Inserted Display, Coin Input Box, Drink Selection Box, Can Collection Box and Terminate Button.

dispenseDrink(int) - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.DispenseController
This method will be used to dispense a drink. It will:
1- Instruct the Drinks Store to dispense the drink. It will also instruct the Can Collection Box to display a can shape.
2- Instruct the Store Controller to update the Drink Store Display on the Machinery Simulator Panel.
3- In case of fault detection, it will send a "fault detected" response to the Transaction Controller.
dispenseDrink(int) - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.machinery.MachineryController
This method instructs the DrinksStore to dispense one drink, and then updates the MachinerySimulatorPanel.. It returns TRUE or FALSE to indicate whether dispensing was successful.
dispenseDrink(int) - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.store.StoreController
This method instructs the DrinksStore to dispense one drink, and then updates the MachinerySimulatorPanel. It returns TRUE or FALSE to indicate whether dispensing was successful.

loginMaintainer(boolean) - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.maintenance.MaintenanceController
This method sets whether the maintainer login. When the MaintenanceController receives a message saying that the Maintainer has successfully logged-in, the following will occur;
1- Messages will be sent to activate the following elements of the MaintenancePanel: CoinDisplay, DrinkDisplay, TotalCashDisplay, ExitButton, Transfer Cash Button and Total Cash Button.
2- The Door will be instructed to set its status as unlocked, and then inform the MachinerySimulatorPanel to update the Door Status Display.
3- The SimulatorControlPanel will be instructed to deactivate the ActivateCustomerPanelButton.
4- The TransactionController will be instructed to terminate and suspend Customer Transactions. Operation TerminateTransaction of TransactionController will be used to accomplish this.
logout() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.maintenance.AccessManager
This method logout the access.
logoutMaintainer() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.maintenance.MaintenanceController
When the MaintenanceController receives a message saying that the Maintainer has correctly logged-out, the following will occur:
1- Check the door status of Door to determine whether the vending machine door is locked. if the door is unlocked, then the exit request is ignored.
2- Re-set the MaintenancePanel (initial values set, buttons activated/ deactivated).
3- Update the CustomerPanel and permit Customer transaction to re-start. This method is invoked by the exit button listener.

MachinerySimulatorPanel - Class in sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.machinery
This panel simulates the physical actions of the maintainer. It enables the user to:
1- Display and enter new values for the number of cans of each DrinksBrand held by the DrinksStore;
2- Display and enter new values for the number of coins of each denomination held by the CashStore;
3- Display whether the vending machine Door is unlocked, and enable it to be locked.

This constructor creates an instance of the MaintenanceController.
MaintenancePanel - Class in sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.maintenance
This panel simulates the vending machines maintainer control panel. It will enable the user (the Maintainer) to:
1- Log-on using a password;
2- Display number of Coins of each denomination in the CashStore;
3- Display total value of cash in the system;
4- Display total number of cans of each DrinksBrand held in the DrinsStore;
5- Change the price of any DrinksBrand;
6- Collect all cash held in they system;
7- Formally exit from the panel.
MaintenancePanel(Frame, MaintenanceController) - Constructor for class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.maintenance.MaintenancePanel
This constructor creates an instance of MaintenancePanel object.

processMoneyReceived(int) - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.TransactionController
This method processes the money received by the Coin Receiver during the progress of a transaction. The following actions are performed during this method:
1- The current total money inserted is obtained from the Coin Receiver.
2- If the received money is more than or equal to the price of the drink, method CompleteTransaction of the Transaction Controller is triggered.
3- If the received money is less than the price of the drink, the Coin Receiver is instructed to continue receiving the coin.
processPassword(String) - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.maintenance.AccessManager
Send a received password string to the Password object for validation. Then instruct the Password Box to become deactivated.

R

receiveCoin(double) - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.CoinReceiver
When a coin is received the following will occur: The Coin Input Box will be instructed to become deactivated. The weight of the Coin will be send to the object Coin for it to determine the denomination and value. The Total Money Inserted Display will be updated. If an invalid coin is entered, the Invalid Coin Display will be instructed to display INVALID COIN. The Transaction Controller will be informed to process the current transaction based on the money received.

setupCustomer() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system.SimulationController
Setup the Customer Panel. This will be achieved as follows:
1- Send a message to deactivate the Activate Customer Panel Button.
2- Send a message to the Customer Panel instructing it to display all its constituent interface objects.
3- Display the current values for out of stock brands and prices.
4- Activate the No Change Available Display (if necessary).
setupMaintainer() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system.SimulationController
Setup the Maintenance Panel. This will be achieved as follows:
1- Send a message to deactive the Activate Maintainer Panel Button.
2- Send a message to instruct all its constituent objects to display themselves, and also instruct them all, except for Password Box to become deactivated.
setupSimulator() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system.SimulationController
Setup the Machinery Simulator Panel. This will be achieved as follows:
1- Deactivate the Activate Machinery Simulator Button.
2- Display Machinery Simulator Panel with initial values set.
3- Deactivate the panel.

sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs - package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs
This is package contains the VMCS main application.
sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer - package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer
This package contains the objects that facilitate the customer transaction of the vending machine.
sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.machinery - package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.machinery
This package contains the objects that facilitate the controller's interaction with the vending machine.
sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.maintenance - package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.maintenance
This package contains the objects that facilitate the maintainer's interaction with the vending machine.
sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.store - package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.store
This package contains the objects that faciliate the access to the Drink Store, Cash Store and Door of the vending machine.
sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system - package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system
This package contains the objects that facilitate the start-up and close-down of the system, and provide the main menu (Simulator Control Panel).
sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.util - package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.util
This package contains objects that provide common functionality utilized across the system specifically objects that provide common user interface functionality.

This constant attribute denotes simulation ends
SimulationController - Class in sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system
This control object represents the operating system user interface at which the VMCS application can be launched.

This constructor creates an instance of the SimulationController object.
SimulatorControlPanel - Class in sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system
This panel is displayed when the system is started up. It enables the user (the Controller) to:
1- Start (switch on);
2- Stop (switch off);
3- Activate the Customer Panel;
4- Activate the Maintenance Panel;
5- Activate the Machinery Simulator Panel;
SimulatorControlPanel(SimulationController) - Constructor for class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system.SimulatorControlPanel
This constructor creates an instance of the SimulatorControlPanel object.
size - Variable in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.store.Store
This attribute hold the size of the store
start() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system.MainController
This method will initiate the creation of all the control objects necessary for simulation of the vending machine, and initiate the display of the SimulatorControlPanel (the main menu).
start() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system.SimulationController
This method is triggered when the Begin Simulation Button is pressed on the SimulatorControlPanel. It will start the simulation of the vending machine by activating the three panel buttons namely; Active Customer Panel Button, Activate Maintainer Panel Button, and Activate Machinery Simulator Button.
start() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.Vmcs
This method start the MainController.
startReceiver() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.CoinReceiver
Commence receiving a series of Coins. To do this the Coin Receiver instructs the Coin Input Box to become activated. It also updates the Total Money Inserted Display on the Customer Panel.
startTransaction(int) - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.TransactionController
This method will start the customer transaction. It receives the identification for the selected drink brand (item) from the Customer Panel. The following actions are performed in the method:
1- The price of the selected item is obtained.
2- The Refund/ Change Tray Display is reset.
3- The Can Collection Box is reset.
4- The Drink Selection Box is deactivated to disallow the selection of further drinks when the transaction is in progress.
5- The Coin Receiver will be instructed to start receiving the coins.
stop() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system.SimulationController
This method will instruct all four panels of the vending machine to close down when instructed by the MainController.
stop() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system.SimulatorControlPanel
This method stop the main controller.
stopReceive() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.CoinReceiver
This method will deactivate the Coin Input Box in order to stop receiving coins.

TerminateButtonListener - Class in sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer
This control object monitors the Terminate Button on the Customer Panel and informs the Transaction Controller when it is pressed.
TerminateButtonListener(TransactionController) - Constructor for class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.TerminateButtonListener
This constructor creates an instance of the Terminate Button Listener.
terminateFault() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.TransactionController
If the TransactionController is informed that a fault was discovered while dispensing a drink, giving change or storing Coins, it will use this method to deactivate the Drink Selection Box and instruct the CoinReceiver to refund the money inserted by the customer.
terminateTransaction() - Method in class sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.TransactionController
If the TransactionController receivers a request to terminate the current transaction then following will occur:
1- If there is no transaction in progress or coin input is completed then the CustomerPanel will be instructed to deactivate the DrinkSelectionBox.
2- If coin input is not yet complete, the CoinReceiver will be instructed to stop coin input and refund the money entered so far.
3- The DrinkSelectionBox is then reset to allow further transactions.
